column1: 用 x、y、z 或 -x、-y、-z 字符串指定朝向轴的视图，重要的是要将旋转顺序保持为 XYZ
column2: specify look at facing Axis by string x,y,z or -x,-y,-z, its important to keep rotation Order as XYZ

column1: 在当前上下文中以 x、y（区域坐标）元组形式获取鼠标位置，并返回命中对象、命中位置、命中法线、命中指数和命中距离
column2: takes in the current context, a mouse position as a tuple x,y (region coords) and gives back the hit object, hit location, hit normal, hit index and hit distance

column1: 在位置处创建一个光点，光点类型有 POINT、SUN、SPOT、AREA
column2: Creates a Light at position, Light types are POINT, SUN, SPOT, AREA
Which Light Type should be spawned

column1: 调用添加光源饼状菜单，在光标处创建光源
column2: Call Add Light Pie Menu, to create a Light Source at Cursor

column1: 初始化饼状菜单时的鼠标位置
column2: Mouse Position when Pie Menu was Initialized

column1: 控制 Blender 并调整光源
column2: Takes control of Blender and Lets you adjust the Light

column1: 分组可对附加组件首选项进行排序
column2: Groups to sort the Addons Preferences

column1: 按住输入键而不是按下
column2: Hold Input Keys instead of Pressing

column1: 按住输入键而不是按下它们，一旦掌握，速度会更快，但也更非传统 => 需要学习
column2: Hold Input Keys instead of Pressing them, is faster once mastered, but also more unconventional => requires learning

column1: 控制鼠标的灵敏度，数值越高，鼠标移动距离越短，效果越好，原始速度 = 1 = 100%
column2: Controls how sensitive the mouse is higher Values lets the mouse travel less distance for more effect, original speed = 1 = 100%

column1: 显示用户界面，显示 Light Control 提供的更多选项。即使用户界面未显示，也可使用其他选项
column2: Show UI that shows more Options that Light Control provides. Additional Options are available even if not shown in UI

column1: 在 3D 栏中显示编辑灯光按钮
column2: Show Edit Light Button in 3D Bar

column1: 在 3D 视图顶栏中显示一个额外按钮，用于进入所选灯光的灯光编辑模式
column2: Show an extra Button for entering Light Edit Mode of selected Light in the 3D View Top Bar

column1: 编辑灯光时隐藏用户界面
自动隐藏用户界面（可与
在灯光编辑模式下显示或隐藏可用的操作界面
column2: Show or Hide available Operations UI when in Light Edit Mode

column1: 显示当前操作用户界面
在 "灯光编辑 "模式下显示或隐藏当前操作用户界面
column2: Show or Hide Current Operation UI when in Light Edit Mode

column1: 在 "光编辑 "模式下显示或隐藏 "小工具 "用户界面
column2: Show or Hide Gizmo UI when in Light Edit Mode

column1: 在光编辑模式下显示或隐藏鼠标上的箭头用户界面
column2: Show or Hide Arrow UI on the Mouse when in Light Edit Mode

column1: 缩放所有 LightControl 字体和象形图 1.0 = 100%
column2: Scales all LightControl Fonts and Pictograms 1.0 = 100%
Color Used for accents in Font

column1: 用于透视指示灯的颜色
column2: Color Used for light Pivot Indicator

column1: 指示灯光的小玩意的不透明度
column2: Opacity of the Gizmos indicating the light

column1: 作为灯光颜色的小工具颜色
用灯光的颜色给小玩意儿着色
column2: Color the Gizmo in the Color that the Light is
